title: New: WWWater – Pink Letters
body:
The enchanting debut from **WWWater** released earlier in the year hinted at far more to come from Charlotte Adigéry and her second offering, Pink Letters doesn’t disappoint.

More traditional yet no less spellbinding, her elegant vocal really blossoms on this track, layering the song with an effortless grace. Check it out below, alongside visuals for the track.
